text: The 1999 European Parliament election for the election of the delegation from the Netherlands was held on 10 June 1999. This is the 5th time the elections have been held for the European elections in the Netherlands. Sources for everything below:Election candidates for the European Elections in the Staatscourant Minutes from the Election Committee == Numbering of the candidates list == The official order and names of candidate lists: == Candidate lists == === CDA - European People's Party === Below is the candidate list for the Christian Democratic Appeal for the 1999 European Parliament election Elected members are in bold {|class="wikitable vatop" ! Number ! Candidate ! Sex ! Preference vote !
